General.Name: Sanlux Co Ltd
General.Description: Sanlux Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sales of rubber V-belts in China and internationally. The company provides tires, motorcycle and bicycle tires, conveyor belts, cutting V-belts, molded rubber products, and 3D printed rubber products. Sanlux Co.,Ltd was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.
